General.Name: Hiroca Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Hiroca Holdings Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobile accessories in China. The company offers various solutions for process design and development, video frames, airbag covers, steering wheel, console, decorative door systems, and outside decoration. It also engages in the surface printing, surface coating, plating, real wood processing, and in-mold injection of vehicle interiors, as well as offers velvet stickers, paste paper, restructuring, and other products. In addition, the company exports its products in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Africa, and internationally. Hiroca Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Dongguan, China.
